# 11.1
```{r}
x1<- matrix(c(3,2,4,7,4,7),3,2)
x2<-matrix(c(6,5,4,9,7,8),3,2)
meanx1<- matrix(c(3,6),2,1)
meanx2<- matrix(c(5,8),2,1)
s<-matrix(c(1,1,1,2),2,2)
```

## Item A

$$ \tilde{y} = (\bar{x}_{1} - \bar{x}_{2})' \hspace{5px} S_{pooled}^{-1} \hspace{5px} x = \tilde{\alpha}' \hspace{5px} x $$

```{r}
sinv<- solve(s)
sinv
```

Assim, 
$$\tilde{y} = \left(\begin{bmatrix}
3 \\
6 
\end{bmatrix} - \begin{bmatrix}
5 \\
8 
\end{bmatrix}\right)' \begin{bmatrix}
2 & -1\\
-1 & 1
\end{bmatrix} \hspace{5px} x 
$$


$$\tilde{y} = \tilde{\alpha}' \hspace{5px} x 
$$

$$\tilde{y} = \begin{bmatrix}
-2 & 0
\end{bmatrix} \hspace{5px} x 
$$

$$\tilde{y} = -2x_{1} 
$$
